name: Slimey Disposition
text:
[ Skill activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
[ Effect ]
Once per turn, you can Special Summon 1 "Humanoid Slime" or 1 "Worm Drake" from your GY in Attack Position, but it cannot be Tributed, except for the Tribute Summon of a Divine-Beast monster. Once per turn, you can discard 1 card, then Fusion Summon "Humanoid Worm Drake" using either "Worm Drake" or "Humanoid Slime" from your field as of the Fusion Materials, and the other material from your Deck.
